#text=I do most of my grocery shopping at Wal-Mart .
#text=Unlike most people , I do n't make a list - I just grab my wallet and think about what I need , and run to the next bus and go !
#text=Once I 'm there , I made sure I got the essentials : milk , cereal , meats , things to make meals with meats , et cetera .
#text=I had some leftover money as well , so I grabbed some fun stuff too : frozen pizza , ice cream for dessert , and a few big bottles of soda .
#text=After that , I got in line at self-checkout , scanned and bagged everything , and paid with my debit card .
#text=After that , I hauled my groceries outside to wait for the bus home , stopping to check the time .
#text=I played some hand-held video games for about 5 minutes at the bus stop and getting on .
#text=Once I was a block away from home , I got off the bus and carried my groceries in , putting cold things in the fridge , frozen things in the freezer , and everything else in the cabinets .
